extendedInfo.description: Captain Science #1 !A free classic comic book from 1950.Captain Science, aka Gordon Dane, was a sci-fi hero in the vein of Buck Rogers who fought all manner of outer space villains including flying saucers, monster gods, alien spawn, and even domestic traitors. His enemies also included the Cat Men of Phobos, the Space Pirates of Lenthus IV, the Deadly Dwarfs of Deimos, the Martian Slavers, and the Insidious Doctor Khartoum. Navigation: Flip pages as if you were reading the real thing.Note: This comic is best viewed on a large screen size , as there is no zoom.Genre: Science FictionPublic Domain Comic.Tags: comicbook ,viewer, superhero, manga, marvel, comics downloads, storytelling, villain, collector, action,  cartoon.

reviews.title: Not too bad
reviews.comment: But i guess it would look better on a tablet....
reviews.author: Georgio Lalos
